sentences.en: “Look at you,” she says pointing at Samuel, age five.
sentences.cn: “看看你，”她指着照片中的五岁塞缪尔说到。

sentences.en: Abigail was a prophet in the Book of Samuel.
sentences.cn: 艾比盖尔是《母尔记》中的一位预言家.

sentences.en: As the business flourished, so did the marriage of Samuel and Terenia.
sentences.cn: 随着生意的兴隆, 塞缪尔和特伦尼娅的婚姻也很兴旺.

sentences.en: Beth: It is called Shaft. Samuel L is the main character.
sentences.cn: 贝思: 电影的名字叫《夏夫特》. 塞谬尔·杰克逊是主要演员.

sentences.en: Even Samuel Butler often gets so quizzical.
sentences.cn: 甚至蒲脱勒(Samuel　Butler)有时也这么古怪.

sentences.en: He commented often on the citations in Samuel Johnson's Dictionary.
sentences.cn: 他常常评论塞缪尔?约翰逊《词典》里的引证.

sentences.en: In a wonderful, unexpected way, it was old Samuel who gave Elizabeth encouragement.
sentences.cn: 用一种奇妙的, 意想不到的方式, 老塞缪尔给了伊丽莎白勇气.

sentences.en: Julia Samuel was one of Prince Andrew's old flames.
sentences.cn: 朱莉娅·塞缪尔是安德鲁王子的旧欢之一。

sentences.en: Mark Twain is a pseudonymity for Samuel Langhorne Clemens.
sentences.cn: 马克·吐温是萨缪尔·兰亨·克里曼斯的笔名.

sentences.en: Samuel Clemens began his writing career as a reporter.
sentences.cn: 萨缪尔克莱门斯以当记者开始他的写作生涯.

sentences.en: Samuel is called Sam for short.
Samuel Langhorne Clemens earned his steamboat pilot's license.
sentences.cn: 塞缪尔·朗荷恩·克列门斯拿到了轮船舵手执照.

sentences.en: Samuel sneaked a glance at Terenia.
sentences.cn: 塞缪尔偷偷地看了特伦尼娅一眼.

sentences.en: There's such a big crowd that I can't pick Samuel out.
sentences.cn: 人太多了,我找不出塞缪尔来.

sentences.en: Why, he is Dr. Samuel Johnson, the most famous man in England.
sentences.cn: 唔, 他就是塞缪尔·约翰生博士,英国最著名的人.

sentences.en: Young Samuel loved to roam the crowded , bustling, cobblestoned streets.
sentences.cn: 年轻的塞缪尔喜欢在这些拥挤 、 喧闹和用鹅卵石铺的街上漫步.

trans.tran_en: a Hebrew prophet, seer, and judge, who anointed the first two kings of the Israelites (I Samuel 1
